name: tetris-reference
description: This repository contains reference a implementation of a Tetris robot.

scripts.test: mocha test/unit --recursive --compilers js:babel/register && npm run lint
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.cover: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- test --recursive --compilers js:babel/register

author: Connor Peet <connor@peet.io>
